blockEntries.name: schema-config-file
blockEntries.desc: The path to the schema config file. The schema config is used only when running Cortex with the chunks storage.

blockEntries.name: ingester-chunk-encoding
blockEntries.desc: Encoding version to use for chunks.

blockEntries.name: querier-query-parallelism
blockEntries.desc: Max subqueries run in parallel per higher-level query.

blockEntries.name: config-expand-env
blockEntries.desc: Expands ${var} or $var in config according to the values of the environment variables.

blockEntries.name: mem-ballast-size-bytes
blockEntries.desc: Size of memory ballast to allocate.

blockEntries.name: debug-mutex-profile-fraction
blockEntries.desc: Fraction of mutex contention events that are reported in the mutex profile. On average 1/rate events are reported. 0 to disable.

blockEntries.name: debug-block-profile-rate
blockEntries.desc: Fraction of goroutine blocking events that are reported in the blocking profile. 1 to include every blocking event in the profile, 0 to disable.

blockEntries.name: ingester-lifecycler-id
blockEntries.desc: ID to register in the ring.
